resources.string: Press to send a bug report!
Wait! Did you check the Change Log section to see if your bug is already known?
Find a bug, or are you getting Force Closed messages? Report them here!
Press here to send a bug report

Known bugs:
-Notification won't close on click

V 1.0_7
-Removed old text
-Green text now works.
-Fixed supported devices page.
V 1.0_6
-Added experimental green highlight to regular bells page. Still a WIP.
V 1.0_5
-Fixed Supported Devices page
-Fixed device email
-Disabled landscape mode
-Fixed bug report send
V 1.0_4
-Added alert to tablets
-Fixed some pages content
-Converted most text items to strings for better performance
-Fixed activity titles
V 1.0_3
-Added notifications for late starts and D.E.A.R.
V 1.0_2
-Fixed most email bugs.
V 1.0_1
-Added some new content in help directories
-Fixed some tablet text issues
V 1.0 - First Build
Note: All devices should work if they have Android 2.2 Froyo or above! If your device does not work, or you get Force Closed messages, send a bug report.
Tell developer that your device works!

Confirmed working:

-HTC Supersonic (EVO 4G)
 Running: 4.1.2 and 2.3.5
-Nexus 7 Stock
-Galaxy S3 Stock
-Kindle Fire Tablets

Add dialog and share option to late start/different schedule.
Fix device page
Add green to Late Start page
Fix tablet notification
-Backround color/logo
-Days off calender
-Tablet support
-Notification for pep rally
-FIND DEAR DAY BElL SCHEDULE
-Fix attach console logs/LogCat
-Fix version detection
